circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: Decedent was found in her apartment.

Gregory was found deceased in a storage shed.
Mr. Young was found deceased at his home on 4/19/21. Multiple attempts were made to locate and contact next of kin but none have been successful.
Steven Evans was found deceased in the back of a semi-trailer. Steven appeared to have been experiencing homelessness. No next of kin can be located for notification.

circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: Two roommates of Donald reported  his death in Salt Lake City, Utah on 01/05/20. Next of kin is unknown. Donald was born in South Carolina.
Robert Huggins was found deceased in his apartment by his neighbor. Next of kin has not been able to be located.
Mr. Zolka was located in his apartment. Next of kin could not be located.

Pedro was found deceased on June 22, 2020 by a nearby fisherman. Pedro is believed to also go by the alias of Reynaldo Landa. Pedro is believed to be from Mexico and has a history in California. Next of kin is unknown.
Deceased was located in a parking garage. Contact can be made to James.spangenber@slcgov.com 801-799-3723

circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: Scotty Burnett was found deceased in his residence in Salt Lake City, Utah on 11/09/2020.
Mr. Pham was discovered deceased in his apartment on July 29, 2021. Next of Kin has been unable to be located.

Mr. Ball was found deceased in his apartment by a friend. Mr. Ball's father (Bertrand) and mother (Irene Dehoyos) are deceased and there were no living siblings. A close next of kin could not be located.
Victor was found deceased on 8/25/2023 in West Valley City, UT. Looking for next-of-kin.

Mr. Berry died in his wheelchair outside of his residence. Looking for next of kin.
Mr. Case was discovered deceased in his apartment. Subject's parents reported to be deceased with no known siblings.

circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: John was located deceased at his residence
Subject was laying on the sidewalk with one arm in the street. Medical transported him to UMC where he passed away.
Mr. Hackley had not been seen or heard from in a month. He was located deceased at his residence. No suspicious circumstances were noted and no next of kin has been found.
James was found deceased in his residence in Salt Lake City, Utah on July 8, 2020.  Next of kin has not been located.
Amy was found deceased during a welfare check of her apartment August 21, 2020. Amy has a history in Oregon. Her next of kin is known but contact information could not be found.
Lidia was located deceased in her apartment in August of 2022. Lidia is originally from Poland but have lived in the United States since 1987. No next of kin could be located.
